title: 21. The machine learning team at your company infrequently needs to use a GKE cluster with specific GPUs for processing a non-restartable and long-running job. How should you set up the GKE cluster for this requirement?
alternatives: A. Deploy the workload on a node pool with non-preemptible compute engine instances and GPUs attached to them. Enable cluster autoscaling and set min-nodes to 1.
B. Deploy the workload on a node pool with preemptible compute engine instances and GPUs attached to them.
C. Enable GKE cluster node auto-provisioning.
